languages.text: The character gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} equal to +{uip|ResistanceBonus|8b80a2f703bb4568875b78c473ed74ba}.

traits.locale_text: The character gains a bonus to all resistance tests equal to +<u>(5 × deflection)</u>.

languages.text: このキャラクターはすべての{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に+{uip|ResistanceBonus|8b80a2f703bb4568875b78c473ed74ba}の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を得る。
